name: Smorgasbord
description:
Smörgåsbord

Find your favorite food while keeping others from finding their food. First to take eat their favorite food wins.

This is a multiplayer game. Play with up to 4 friends!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Instructions:
---

  1. Enter a display name
  2. Enter a room name (NOTE: room name must match your friend's room name)
  3. Wait for Lobby to load before other players can load
  4. Ready up
  5. Start game

Controls:
---

Move - WASD
Camera - Mouse
Jump - Spacebar
Interact - E
Eat - F

Credits:
---

Music: Hex (twitter: hexoclock)
Development: Andres (twitter: hereisandres)
3D Art: Unity asset pack by Polydactyl
